  • The Family - Nike Basketball

    An exploration of all the basketball players sponsored by Nike.

    能加入中文吗？This is a very interactive page with a variety of ways to filter the players shown, which you can then click to view their profile page. It was made to be localizable, and is entirely configured through XML. (Credits: jQuery, 我看可以吧; Agency: R/GA)
  • Signature Moves - Nike Basketball

    A destination for learning fresh moves from some of the best ballers.

    This has a dynamic landing page and is rich in content, all configured in XML and localizable. (Credits: jQuery; Agency: R/GA)
  • NotMyBrokenAnkles.com

    A fun support page to a popular viral video starring Kobe Bryant.

    This page was, thus far, the most fun to develop. A series in amusing questions along with hilarious graphics are 试试 to the user. A customized, shareable outcome is generated from the answers. (Credits: jQuery, jOdometer; Agency: R/GA)
  • Nike 6.0

    As one of Nike's fastest growing brands, Nike 6.0's site relaunched with a new design and expanded content.

    The player profiles are fully explorable without the page having to reload, while remaining search engine friendly and gracefully degradable without JavaScript. (Credits: jQuery, SWFAddress; Agency: R/GA, Nemo)
  • Hoopstalk Live - Nike Basketball

    A Nike-sponsored live webcast featuring league giants answering questions from an audience logged in through Facebook.

    This page was only online for a few days. A countdown signaled the upcoming show, which was activated through polling the server. Users could log into Facebook and chat to ask questions. (Credits: jQuery, Countdown; Agency: R/GA)
  • Nike Basketball Homepage

    A bold new landing page for one of Nike's most popular brand sites, which is easily customizable per region.

    Each region can customize through XML the background, links, and touts. News is pulled from the blog via RSS. (Credits: jQuery; Agency: R/GA)
